# RでPolarsを使ってみる

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}

```python
import polars as pl
import polars.selectors as cs

pl.DataFrame(
    {
        "x": [1, 2, 3],
        "y": ["a", "b", "c"],
    }
).select(cs.by_name("x"))
```

:::

::: {.column width="50%"}

```r
library(polars)

pl$DataFrame(
  x = c(1, 2, 3),
  y = c("a", "b", "c"),
)$select(cs$by_name("x"))
```

:::
